name: TheTour
description:
The Tour is a short horror walking simulator based on the old Illuminati card game from 1975. You find yourself in an empty room with only a painting of one of the cards from the Illuminati game, you get closer to it and strange things begin to happen. Are you going to be able to escape this nightmare?

This game takes the player into a world in which the cards predict the future! 

You will have to traverse different rooms which represent and embody what the cards will show you, and as you explore this world you will see and experience these rooms differently. 

But be careful, you might not be alone, and try to stay out of the shadows!

Controls
  • To move use W,A,S,D.
  • Press the Mouse Wheel to zoom on the screen.
  • Shift to Run.
